projects.title: AI CPA Agentic Research System
projects.description: Intelligent tax assistant leveraging LLM-powered agentic workflows to analyze tax returns and identify optimization opportunities. Built with Python, LangChain, and PydanticAI to automate complex tax research and deliver actionable insights for accounting professionals.

projects.title: Equipment Energy Optimizer (MARL)
projects.description: Multi-agent reinforcement learning system using Proximal Policy Optimization to intelligently schedule manufacturing equipment during peak solar production and off-peak hours. Achieved 25% projected energy cost reduction while maintaining >99% job completion rate through autonomous agent coordination.

projects.title: Autonomous Visual QA Assistant
projects.description: End-to-end computer vision pipeline automating quality control in manufacturing. Combines YOLOv8 for defect detection, MobileNetV2 for classification, and multimodal LLM for analysis. Achieved 99.97% detection accuracy with projected annual savings of $96K through automated rework decisions.

projects.title: Photosynthesizers - Milwaukee Domes
projects.description: Mobile-first web application enhancing visitor experience at Milwaukee Domes conservatory through AI-powered plant identification. Features BioCLIP classification, GPT-4 health assessment, multi-language support (English, Spanish, Chinese), and crowd-sourced monitoring. Full-stack implementation with React, TypeScript, FastAPI, and Supabase.

projects.title: Diabetes Prediction ML Pipeline
projects.description: Production-ready machine learning pipeline for diabetes risk prediction. Implements Random Forest classifier with comprehensive feature engineering, statistical validation, and data preprocessing. Designed for clinical decision support with emphasis on model interpretability.

projects.title: Custom Wordle Game Engine
projects.description: Feature-rich Wordle implementation with administrative dashboard, persistent SQL storage, and comprehensive test suite. Developed using Agile methodology with modular architecture for extensibility and maintainability.

projects.title: Automated XML Schema Documentation
projects.description: RAG-powered CI/CD pipeline automating XSD documentation and analysis. Leverages machine learning to extract semantic relationships and generate human-readable documentation, reducing manual documentation time by 80%.

projects.title: Modern Portfolio Website
projects.description: Performance-optimized personal portfolio built with React, Framer Motion, and Tailwind CSS. Features smooth animations, canvas-based rendering, and Vercel-inspired glassmorphism design. Emphasizes 60fps performance and clean architecture.

projects.title: Campaign Poster Management Platform
projects.description: Full-stack web application for managing campaign marketing materials. Features secure authentication, image upload with compression, and RESTful API. Built with React frontend, Node.js backend, and MariaDB for reliable data persistence.
